about.summary: Python bindings to Piranha computer algebra system.

name: pyranha
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.8" %}

package:
  name: pyranha
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: piranha-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/bluescarni/piranha/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 649f91ceee56446f903551f0665b8807b833d91fd9622c412eadc95d353ac8e6

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true        # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - toolchain
    - cmake
    - gmp
    - mpfr
    - boost     1.62.*
    - bzip2     1.0.*
    - zlib      1.2.*
    - piranha   {{ version }}
    - python
  run:
    - gmp
    - mpfr
    - boost     1.62.*
    - bzip2     1.0.*
    - zlib      1.2.*
    - python
    - mpmath
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - pyranha
  commands:
    - python -c "import pyranha.test; pyranha.test.run_test_suite()";

about:
  home: https://github.com/bluescarni/piranha
  license: GPL v3 and LGPL v3
  license_file: COPYING.lgpl3
  summary: 'Python bindings to Piranha computer algebra system.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - isuruf
    - bluescarni
